response.overview: Deep in the forests of the Pacific Northwest, a father devoted to raising his six kids with a rigorous physical and intellectual education is forced to leave his paradise and enter the world, beginning a journey that challenges his idea of what it means to be a parent.
response.tagline: He prepared them for everything except the outside world.
response.title: Captain Fantastic

release_dates.note: Rio de Janeiro International Film Festival

results.name: Director to Director - James Ponsoldt x Matt Ross | Bleecker Street
